name: Chibi Fighter
description:
Made for GMTK 2019 Game Jam, fight your friends in this tiny local versus game! Up to 4 players, get hit once and you're out!

Controls:

WASD / Left Analog Stick - Movement

Space / A - Select Character / Attack

Enter / Start - Start match / end match (after someone wins)

Escape / B - Deselect Character / Quit game
